text: 25.11: FG 23.11; 23.29; 25.25; 26.31-32; 28.19Gu maaŋ muuŋgip rɨmɨnga bigɨna mbatɨga thueŋ muuŋgip, gu ne suaŋv rimgirga. Gu maaŋ muuŋgiap mbe khar na sav na nzuav nzuai buni, nta guigira buni guari fhuvara, guma the fhura na ndim, mbe farve khɨngirga fhu. Gu khueŋ vuzvugi, gu nduara Sisar han ŋgɨrga, ana na buni mbarararga.” 25.11 Romin tɨv khaŋ nzuai, Rom guma the, mbe ana suaŋv suanga, ana mbe phorgɨv wo suaŋv suanga, mbe tuituigiap ana buni mbararagi fhu. Ana mbe phorgɨ suaŋrim, mbe ana khɨrarga, Sisar ana buni mbararga. Sisar, ana Roman ŋguive, ana za nta gari guman pan ma.
